column4: Hey, I'm a first time Linux-er that has already burned Ubuntu to disc, etc, and I have the disc in, but whenever I shut down and turn the power back on, it goes back into windows instead of booting from the LiveCD. I'm running XP SP2 on a Dell laptop. Any ideas?
: When you start your computer it may say to press a certain key to enter boot menu, or setup.   ;
on my dell it's F2 and F12
